short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Experience vibrant media visuals every time you open a new browser tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Immerse yourself in dynamic media experiences with every new browser tab

Discover a captivating browsing experience with FlowVision New Tab, a portal to a meticulously selected world of stunning media visuals. Open a new tab and dive into an immersive environment where crisp, high-resolution animations, videos, and images merge to create an extraordinary digital journey. Tailored for users who appreciate finesse, FlowVision delivers visuals that are clear, lively, and designed to enchant.

By clicking "Add to chrome", I accept and agree to installing "FlowVision - New Tab" search setting will be provided by Microsoft Bing and that provided by the service, Terms of Use and Privacy Policy.

https://flowvision-newtab.com/privacy.html
https://flowvision-newtab.com/terms.html

FlowVision goes beyond mere imagery, offering a smooth integration with your browser for a seamless and efficient browsing experience. Customize your visual exploration with preferred settings or allow the diverse range of stunning visuals to surprise you each time.

Utilizing the search functionality within the new tab involves the collection of your search terms alone. Installing this extension implies your agreement to our collection and sharing of your search data with Microsoft Bing.
